io.lettuce.core.masterslave

类 StaticMasterSlaveTopologyProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.lettuce.core.masterslave.StaticMasterSlaveTopologyProvider
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    TopologyProvider

    public class StaticMasterSlaveTopologyProvider
extends Object
implements TopologyProvider
    Topology provider for a static node collection. This provider uses a static collection of nodes to determine the role of each node. Node roles may change during runtime but the configuration must remain the same. This TopologyProvider does not auto-discover nodes.
